attributes.action: Bringe CRiminal charges against Maria MIller CUlture secretary for Fraud, false accounting, misuse of public funds.
attributes.additional_details: If I, an ordinary citizen ,was to have been found commiting the criminal offence of Fraud, misuse of public funds and  false accounting I would be charged and dealt with by the Justice system.Why then have no criminal charges been brought against  the corrupt  activities of the culture secretary.Please submit all citizens of the United Kingdom to the same treatment, no exceptions.
